title: [BUG] Skia draws variable fonts with incorrect width and weight
body:
For example, this Vast Variable Font has default values of **width = 50** and **weight = 400**. But Skia draws with **width = 5** (even if min value is 50) and **weight = 100**

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/22072836/132017701-9073c7f3-6699-486d-afd9-2c8dd6d63d8e.png)
